description:
The world rejoices in the wake of Whitebeard`s death, and a host of powerful pirates vie for his position. Meanwhile, Luffy`s friends fear that Ace`s death may be more than the rubber-man can handle - if he ever wakes up!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gun`yuu Kakkyo Su! "Atarashii Jidai" no Hajimari!
Luttes de pouvoir ! Le début d`une nouvelle ère !
Mighty Leaders Face Each Other Down! Heralding the `New Era`!
القادة العظماء يواجهون بعضهم بعضًا! تبشيرًا بـ`العصر الجديد`!
群雄割拠す! "新しい時代"の始まり!
